benchmark_details.name: Rational Probabilistic Belief (RPB) dataset
benchmark_details.overview: This paper introduces a novel synthetically generated dataset of 517 claims with indeterminate truth values for evaluating LLMsâ€™ probabilistic beliefs and their adherence to principles of probabilistic reasoning.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To evaluate the ability of LLMs to adhere to the principles of complementarity and monotonicity in probabilistic reasoning.

data.source: Generated using language models with a focus on probabilistic claims.
data.annotation: Manually verified and generated by prompting large language models.

methodology.calculation: Comparing the model's generated probabilities with expected outcomes based on principles of probabilistic reasoning.
methodology.interpretation: Lower deviation from rational probabilities indicates better performance in probabilistic reasoning.
methodology.validation: Tested using a validation set of claims.
